title: dbCommand
description: A command, maybe a read-only information, which may be pulled or only pushed by the device, or a writable property or an action

classId.description: the command identifier in the managing class

equipId.description: the equipment identifier the command is attached to

readable.description: whether the command is readable, i.e. accepts to receive a value request

writable.description: whether the command is writable, i.e. accepts to receive values pushed to the device

historized.description: whether the received values should be historized
